wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Lawrence Davis (3 February 1911 – 1987), commonly referred to as Tom Davis and Tommy Davis, is an Irish former association footballer who played as a centre forward for several clubs in the League of Ireland and the English Football League. Davis was also a dual international footballer—playing for both the Republic of Ireland (FAI) and Ireland (IFA), scoring a total of five goals in five caps. He was born in County Dublin.
